channel.title: Matthew Zegar | Personal Website
channel.description: Recent content on Matthew Zegar | Personal Website

item.title: Hugo, Another Static Site Generator
item.description: I always took pride in creating my personal websites basically from scratch. But, what’s the point of jumping through hoops when other developers already have for me. At this current time, static site generators are the new hip thing, so let’s try one out. Hugo is a static site generator that basically wraps a bunch of markdown files. This got me excited as previously updating my website was a pain. I had to go through this typical process…

item.title: Projects
item.description: Retter - Flutter Reddit App Dart, Flutter (Jun 2020) A complete Reddit experience built using Flutter Open sourced and contributed to by other developers Built for iOS and Android Social Gaming App C++, GoogleTest, CMake (Jan 2020 - Apr 2020) Developed the application using modern C++ practices Created a build system using CMake Wrote extensive testing for the application using the GoogleTest framework Led an eight-person group as the “Project Manager” Database Interface Java, JavaFX, Spring (Apr 2019)
